languages.text: "Госпожа, что-то я не разумею, больно уж путано вы говорить изволите. Крови я повидал немало, но уж поверьте, сражаться буду до последней капли!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сержант озадаченно косится на псайкера.{/n} "Госпожа, что-то я не разумею, больно уж путано вы говорить изволите. Крови я повидал не мало, но уж поверьте, сражаться буду до последней капли!"

languages.text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"
languages.original_text: "Госпожа, что-то я не разумею, больно уж путано вы говорить изволите. Крови я повидал немало, но уж поверьте, сражаться буду до последней капли!"

traits.locale_text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I don't rightly understand these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, sure have, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"
"Pardon me, my lady, but I don't rightly understand these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, sure have, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"
"Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, sure have, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"
"Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, sure have, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"
"Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"
"Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Werteste, doch ich verstehe Eure hochgestochenen Worte nicht. Ich habe viel Blut gesehen, sicher, aber glaubt mir, ich werde bis zu meinem letzten Tropfen kämpfen!"
languages.original_text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Werteste, doch ich verstehe Eure hochgestochenen Worte nicht. Ich habe viel Blut gesehen, sicher, aber glaubt mir, ich werde bis zu meinem letzten Tropfen kämpfen!"

languages.text: « Sauf votre respect, madame, je ne comprends pas un mot de ce que vous racontez. J'en ai vu, du sang, mais croyez-moi... je combattrai jusqu'à la dernière goutte ! »
languages.original_text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"

traits.locale_text: « Sauf votre respect, madame, je ne comprends pas un mot de ce que vous racontez. C'est vrai, j'en ai vu, du sang, mais croyez-moi... je combattrai jusqu'à la dernière goutte ! »

languages.text: “请原谅，女士，我实在听不懂这些花里胡哨的话。我确实见过很多血，但相信我，我会一直战斗下去，直到流干最后一滴血！”
languages.original_text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"

traits.locale_text: “请原谅，女士，我实在听不懂这些花里胡哨的话。我确实见过很多血，没错，而且相信我，我会一直战斗下去，直到流干最后一滴血！”

languages.text: 「失礼だが、お嬢さん、私にはあなたのおっしゃる上品な言葉は理解できない。たくさんの血を見てきたが、信じて欲しい…私は最後の一滴まで戦い抜くと！」
languages.original_text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"

traits.locale_text: 「失礼ですが、お嬢さん、私にはあなたのおっしゃる上品な言葉は理解できない。確かにたくさんの血を見てきた。だけど信じて欲しい…私は最後の一滴まで戦い抜くと！」

languages.text: «Perdóneme, milady, pero no me entra en la cabeza eso que dice. He visto mucha sangre, pero créame, ¡lucharé hasta la última gota!».
languages.original_text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"

traits.locale_text: «Perdóneme, milady, pero no me entra en la cabeza eso que dice. He visto mucha sangre, sí, pero, créame, ¡lucharé hasta la última gota!».

languages.text: "Affedersiniz leydim ama söylediğiniz süslü kelimeleri kafam almıyor. Ölüme yabancı değilim ama inanın bana, kanımın son damlasına kadar savaşacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Pardon me, my lady, but I can't get my head 'round these fancy words you're saying. I've seen plenty of blood, but, trust me, I'll fight till my last drop!"

traits.locale_text: "Affedersiniz leydim ama söylediğiniz süslü kelimeleri kafam almıyor. Ölüme yabancı değilim ama inanın bana, kanımın son damlasına kadar savaşacağım!"
